text: Ramadana masa, ete kura'ana nayila kara hayeche manusera hedayatera jan'ya ebam hidayatera spasta nidarsana o satyasatyera parthakyakarirupe. Kaje'i tomadera madhye ye e masa pabe se yena e mase siyama palana kare [1]. Tabe tomadera ke'u asustha thakale ba saphare thakale an'ya dinagulote e sankhya purana karabe [2].
